00028 class View{
00029 
00030 
00031  private:
00032 
00033   // Resolution independent x,y,w,h region viewport
00034   float view_left, view_top, view_width, view_height;
00035 
00036   int resolution;                             
00037   unsigned int max_resolutions;               
00038   unsigned int left, top, width, height;      
00039   unsigned int min_size;                      
00040   unsigned int max_size;                      
00041   unsigned int requested_width;               
00042   unsigned int requested_height;              
00043   float contrast;                             
00044 
00047 
00050   void calculateResolution( unsigned int m, unsigned int r );
00051 
00052 
00053  public:
00054 
00055   int xangle;                                  
00056   int yangle;                                  
00057   bool shaded;                                 
00058   int shade[3];                                
00059   int layers;                                  
00060 
00062   View() {
00063     resolution = 0; max_resolutions = 0; min_size = 8; max_size = 0;
00064     width = 0; height = 0;
00065     view_left = 0.0; view_top = 0.0; view_width = 1.0; view_height = 1.0;
00066     requested_width = 0; requested_height = 0;
00067     contrast = 1.0;
00068     xangle = 0; yangle = 90;
00069     shaded = false; shade[0] = 0; shade[1] = 0; shade[2] = 0;
00070     layers = 1;
00071   };
00072 
00073 
00075 
00076   void setContrast( float c ){ contrast = c; };
00077 
00078 
00080 
00081   void setMaxSize( unsigned int m ){ max_size = m; };
00082 
00083 
00085 
00086   void setMaxResolutions( unsigned int r ){ max_resolutions = r; };
00087 
00088 
00090   unsigned int getRequestWidth(){
00091     if( requested_width == 0 && requested_height > 0 ){
00092       requested_width = static_cast<unsigned int>( width * requested_height / height );
00093     }
00094     if( requested_width > width ) requested_width = width;
00095     if( requested_width > max_size ) requested_width = max_size;
00096     // If no width has been set, use our full size
00097     if( requested_width <= 0 ) requested_width = width;
00098     return requested_width;
00099   };
00100 
00101 
00103 
00104   void setRequestWidth( unsigned int w ){
00105     if( w < max_size ) requested_width = w;
00106     else requested_width = max_size;
00107   };
00108 
00109 
00111   unsigned int getRequestHeight(){
00112     if( requested_height == 0 && requested_width > 0 ){
00113       requested_height = static_cast<unsigned int>( height * requested_width / width );
00114     }
00115     if( requested_height > height ) requested_height = height;
00116     if( requested_height > max_size ) requested_height = max_size;
00117     // If no height has been set, use our full size
00118     if( requested_height <= 0 ) requested_height = height;
00119     return requested_height;
00120   };
00121 
00123 
00124   void setRequestHeight( unsigned int h ){
00125     if( h < max_size ) requested_height = h;
00126     else requested_height = max_size;
00127   };
00128

00151 
00152

00156

00162   void setImageSize( unsigned int w, unsigned int h ){ width = w; height = h; };
00163 
00164 
00166 
00167   void setLayers( int l ){ layers = l; };
00168 
00169 
00171   float getContrast(){ return contrast; };
00172 
00174   unsigned int getImageWidth(){ return width; };
00175 
00177   unsigned int getImageHeight(){ return height; };
00178 
00180   unsigned int getViewLeft() ;
00181 
00183   unsigned int getViewTop();
00184 
00186   unsigned int getViewWidth();
00187 
00189   unsigned int getViewHeight();
00190 
00192   unsigned int getLayers(){ return layers; };
